MATSMODEpart1.SSML: Select the mode in which to run the Mats survey.

$EFO_MATS_MODE|part1.MATSMODEpart1: Select the mode in which to run the Mats survey.

MATSINTROpart1.SSML: We will show you a series of forteen statements. You must rate how much you agree with each of them. For Example, as shown below, if you strongly agree with the statement, I like Kennywood, you would click on the Strongly Agree button.

$EFO_MATS_INTRO|part1.MATSINTROpart1: We will show you a series of forteen statements. You must rate how much you agree with each of them. For Example, as shown below, if you strongly agree with the statement, I like Kennywood, you would click on the Strongly Agree button.

MATSINTROpart2.SSML: Click on the next button to begin.

$EFO_MATS_INTRO|part2.MATSINTROpart2: Click on the next button to begin.

MATSINSTpart1.SSML: Answer the questions on each page and then click next.  You may come back at any point and change your answers.

$EFO_MATS_INST|part1.MATSINSTpart1: Answer the questions on each page and then click next.  You may come back at any point and change your answers.

MATSINSTpart2.SSML: Click the Submit button when you are satisfied with your answers, or go back and make changes as desired.

$EFO_MATS_INST|part2.MATSINSTpart2: Click the Submit button when you are satisfied with your answers, or go back and make changes as desired.
